name: Boxplosion
description: An intense particle colliding experience for Virtual Reality. Interact with particles in unique new ways.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Recent dual core, Quad core or better recommended Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 280 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires VR motion controllers
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
